subject: Baseball
Subways
lead_paragraph: Resourceful fans without the resources to buy Game 7 tickets found spots on the platform of the No. 7 train to peer into the stadium and catch glimpses of the game, albeit incomplete ones.
snippet: Resourceful fans without the resources to buy Game 7 tickets found spots on the platform of the No. 7 train to peer into the stadium and catch glimpses of the game, albeit incomplete ones.
